message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this unique product for $1200000. I believe its value to you will far exceed the price. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $900000 for it. Can you consider my offer?

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product. While I understand your perspective on the price, I believe the unique features and potential benefits of this product justify a higher price point. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1000000.  I'm confident you'll find this investment to be very worthwhile.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $950000. Can you consider my revised offer?
